description:
Tainyan and Sainyan are twin sisters from the China-based country of Shai-Fang, an isolated region of the Continent surrounded by steep and cloudy mountains. They are the descendants of a lineage of exorcists that has been carrying the responsibility of protecting the village for generations, and are bound by an unbreakable cord called the Ryu-Rin-Ren which is wrapped around their necks. They left for a journey in the outside world to bring back the Goshintai (lit. "Sacred Body of God"), a mysterious divine protection that has once made Shai-Fang a warm and peaceful land. It is later revealed that this "Goshintai" is actually a human, a girl called the "Child of the Dragon", considered a being with god-like powers in Shai-Fang.
Tainyan, the older sister, is a holy sword user wielding a jian with a strong-willed, but cheerful, personality. Although Tainyan is always complaining to Sainyan, they are sisters united by a deep bond.
Source: Wiki
name: Tanyan
